CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 21, 1953, pg. 14, reads: "Triple Birthday Party - Miss Annie Montgomery, owner and proprietor of the Chicken Shack, 615-617 Ann Street, Homestead, held a triple birthday party for her three sisters from Ohio when they visited her recently. They are Mrs. Libby Brazalton, Miss Corina McCall and Mrs. Jessie Gremmett.  Mrs. Libby Brazalton is president of the Future Outlook League of Chagrin Fall, Ohio.  Miss Corina McCall is a member of the Corinthian Methodist Church of Cleveland.  Mrs. Jessie Gremmett of 10707 Hampen Street, Cleveland, is a member of the Corav Baptist Church. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of seven women, including Annie Montgomery, Libby Brazalton, Corina McCall, Jessie Gremmett, and four men, gathered around table with unsymmetrical birthday cake for three sisters, in kitchen of Chicken Shack, 615 - 617 Ann Street, Homestead
